summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; granting easements to Puget Sound Power and Light Company for underground electric system under, across and over the City's TESS Pump Station Sites in the southwest quarter of Section 26, Township 25 North, Range 5 East, W.M. (N.E. 8th St.), and in the northeast quarter of Section 10, Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W.M., (S.E. 28th St.).
